api_list.name: find-zip-codes-by-city-and-district
api_list.description: Return all zip codes located in city's district
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://polish-zip-codes1.p.rapidapi.com/city/Wrocław/district/Oporów"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "polish-zip-codes1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://polish-zip-codes1.p.rapidapi.com/city/{city}/district/{district}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "polish-zip-codes1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: find-zip-codes-by-city-and-street
api_list.description: Return all zip codes by street name in the city.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://polish-zip-codes1.p.rapidapi.com/city/Wrocław/street/Komuny paryskiej"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "polish-zip-codes1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://polish-zip-codes1.p.rapidapi.com/city/{city}/street/{street}"

api_list.name: zip-code-info
api_list.description: Return zip code information, that is a list of zip code entries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://polish-zip-codes1.p.rapidapi.com/01-123"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "polish-zip-codes1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://polish-zip-codes1.p.rapidapi.com/{zipcode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "polish-zip-codes1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

nazwa.description: name of an institution if zip code is assigned to a specific institution

numer.description: street number if only one number is assigned to this zip code

parzystosc.description: even partity, where "PARZYSTE" = even and "NIEPARZYSTE" = odd

api_list.name: find-zip-codes-by-city
api_list.description: Return all zip codes that belong to this city. If there is more then one city with that name, all zip codes are returned.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://polish-zip-codes1.p.rapidapi.com/city/Wrocław"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "polish-zip-codes1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://polish-zip-codes1.p.rapidapi.com/city/{city}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "polish-zip-codes1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
